arts.ttl: Atalanta vs AC Milan – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Atalanta and AC Milan meet in a highly anticipated Serie A clash on Tuesday evening, with both sides seeking crucial points. Atalanta remain the only unbeaten side in the Italian top flight, while the Rossoneri arrive in Bergamo looking to bounce back from a frustrating draw against Pisa. arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan head coach Massimiliano Allegri has resolved the doubts regarding the team that will take on Atalanta at the New Balance Arena. Allegri will be wanting a response from his side after they dropped yet more points against a newly-promoted team on Friday night, drawing 2-2 with Pisa. arts.ttl: Atalanta – Milan: an opportunity for the Rossoneri to turn the page
arts.sum: Tonight Milan will face Atalanta in the ninth round of the Serie A season. The Rossoneri will be guests at the New Balance Arena, a stadium where they have not won since the 2021/22 season, the year they claimed the scudetto. Since then, they have recorded one draw and two losses, highlighting the difficulty of […]

Both Atalanta and AC Milan will be hoping to get back to winning ways as they look to overturn two disappointing draws at the weekend. Atalanta's 1-1 draw with Cremonese and AC Milan's 2-2 draw at hom...

arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon AC Milan will name a largely unchanged side against Atalanta on Tuesday night; however, it could be a big chance for some. The result against Pisa was not good enough, but considering the circumstances, it is not the end of the world. arts.ttl: Gimenez or Nkunku: who should start for Milan vs Atalanta?
arts.sum: Ten days ago, Milan beat Fiorentina in the final minutes, coming from behind, thanks in part to Santiago Gimenez’s entrance. His hard work and positioning allowed Rafael Leao to escape the constant attention of opposing central defenders. Against Pisa, the Mexican started from the first minute. Leao benefited again, but the former Feyenoord striker was […]

arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon The calendar has not been too kind to AC Milan recently, and they will play their third game in nine days against Atalanta tomorrow.
